headline: Vistra Declares Dividend on Common Stock and Series A Preferred Stock
summary: Vistra (NYSE: VST) announced today that its board of directors has declared a quarterly dividend of $0.2280 per share of Vistra's common stock, reflecting an estimated aggregate payment of approximately $75 million this quarter. The common dividend is payable on March 31, 2026, to common stockholders of record as of March 20, 2026. The ex-dividend date for the common dividend will be March 20, 2026.

headline: Southern Co. (SO) Misses Q4 Earnings Estimates
summary: Southern Co. (SO) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of -1.79% and +1.70%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Vistra Ties Texas Data Center Deals To Long Term Power Demand Story
summary: Vistra (NYSE:VST) has secured major new power contracts with Texas data centers, tying its generation fleet more directly to fast growing electricity demand. The company is being highlighted by analysts as a key beneficiary of rising power needs linked to data center build outs and broader electrification trends. Vistra operates as an integrated power company, supplying electricity and related services across competitive markets, including Texas. The new data center contracts connect its...

headline: Short Seller Jim Chanos Calls Elon Musk's Orbital Datacenter Goals 'AI Snake Oil' — Says Need To See 'Actual' Savings
summary: Short seller James Chanos criticizes tech's push for orbital datacenters, citing high costs as AI's demand for power surges.
